description: standing man wearing purple pants, short jacket, hat and heavy clogs; man has white hair and holds his hat brim in his PR hand; received attached thick mat board
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

LRQ, in black: [St / Jean / Du / Mont]; at bottom, in black: [croquis (illegible) / Enterrement en / Vendee -]
medium: Black, white, and red chalk on artist's board
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2010; sold in April  for RPOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2010-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Standing Man Tipping Hat, Study for "Enterrement en Vendée"
